messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2013
messages.msgSnippet: ... Bridget-- Koosh balls.  Except in the kitchen, the little ones don t tend to do much, if any, damage.  And they really fly, don t hurt when they hit
messages.messageBody:
> That's a really good idea. Now can anyone think of a way to make it
> something to throw? The men in dh's family have always been throwers,
> not punchers. Wyndham is the same. When he's mad, he rarely hits or
> kicks, he throws.

Bridget--
Koosh balls. Except in the kitchen, the little ones don't tend to do much,
if any, damage. And they really fly, don't hurt when they hit someone, and
have a kind of satisfying feel to throw. Also, they have a tendency to
induce laughter at my house, a nice effect!
brenda
